description: Demo-only simulator for PM-KISAN eligibility and impact, combining clear rule checks with a simple ML probability estimate.

benefit_amount.notes: Approximate annual income support used for illustration in this hackathon demo.

fairness_policy.interpretation: For this demo, the difference in approval rates between any two monitored groups (e.g., male vs female) should not exceed 10 percentage points. Larger gaps should trigger a WARN or FAIL status in the bias report.

ethical_disclaimer: This PM-KISAN module is a hackathon demonstration only. It is NOT an official government system and must not be used to make real-world eligibility or payment decisions. The rules and parameters are simplified for educational purposes and may not reflect actual policy.
